AI.name: Mini Mario & Friends amiibo Challenge
AI.description: Make minis march like never before in this free download. Tap an amiibo™ figure to guide 1 of 11 minis across more than 50 levels. Use minis and their unique abilities, like Yoshi™ who can eat enemies or Rosalina who launches to high places, to reach the exit. But watch out! Mine carts, ghostly Boos and other new obstacles lurk around every corner. To get started, simply tap any compatible amiibo figure on the Wii U™ GamePad controller. Or, by tapping specific amiibo figures, you can guide minis that have their own unique abilities and exclusive sets of levels. These specially designed, character-themed levels include their own look, remixed music and obstacles for you to master, which comes in handy the more you play. Earn in-game amiibo tokens with different minis to unlock even more difficult challenges.

MX.name: Mini Mario & Friends amiibo Challenge
MX.description: Los Minis marchan como nunca en esta descarga gratuita. Toca con una figura amiibo™ para llevar a 1 de 11 Minis a la meta en más 50 niveles. Usa las habilidades especiales de Minis como Mini Yoshi™ quien puede comer enemigos, o Mini Rosalina quien puede realizar grandes saltos. ¡Pero ten cuidado! Pues hallarás obstáculos y enemigos en cada rincón. Para empezar, solo toca el control Wii U™ GamePad con cualquier figura amiibo. O, al tocar con ciertas figuras amiibo, podrás guiar a ciertos Minis que cuentan con habilidades especiales y niveles exclusivos hacia la meta. Estos niveles especiales fueron diseñados para estos personajes y contienen diseños, música y obstáculos únicos que te darán nuevas experiencia conforme avanzas en el juego. Al usar distintos Minis, podrás ganar fichas amiibo dentro del juego que te permitirán desbloquear nuevos desafíos.

SV.name: Mini Mario & Friends amiibo Challenge
SV.description: Make minis march like never before in this free download. Tap an amiibo™ figure to guide 1 of 11 minis across more than 50 levels. Use minis and their unique abilities, like Yoshi™ who can eat enemies or Rosalina who launches to high places, to reach the exit. But watch out! Mine carts, ghostly Boos and other new obstacles lurk around every corner. To get started, simply tap any compatible amiibo figure on the Wii U™ GamePad controller. Or, by tapping specific amiibo figures, you can guide minis that have their own unique abilities and exclusive sets of levels. These specially designed, character-themed levels include their own look, remixed music and obstacles for you to master, which comes in handy the more you play. Earn in-game amiibo tokens with different minis to unlock even more difficult challenges.
